website_summaries.verdict: An efficient and secure way to dispose of many personal documents in one session.
pros: Produces tiny shreds that would be nearly impossible to reassemble
The 5-gallon bin doesn't require frequent emptying
LED indicators alert when the bin is full or when the machine is overheated
Handles roughly 14 pages at a time in seconds
Shreds CDs and credit cards with ease
Continual use for up to an hour without overheating
cons: Shredder costs more than many of its competitors

customer_reviews.title: What gives?  Fresh from box and it won't work.  I found out too late
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shredder in February. I did not open box/packing until this week. I found out that the unit will not work when plugged in. The panel lights say, "Door open". I have looked and could not find anything broken. I replaced everything and I get the same results. Too late to get a return/refund. $135 bucks thrown away !!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Better then a Fellows
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought! Great value you get everything you need for the price point. Would have spent more $$$ on a simular Fellows model. This solid, well built, heavy and very quiet. The wheels makes it easy to move it around and haven't broken off or given me any issues. Very happy with product. Delivery was fast and arrived in great condition, well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Shredder bin split after only 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: The paper shredding works fine and the unit is quieter than our last unit and produces smaller shreds. But the black plastic bin split down the side vertically after only 3 uses! This is hard to believe as there was no mishandling of the shredder and this happened during normal use. Hopefully we can just get a replacement bin instead of having to ship the entire unit back.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was leery at first in buying this blindly having never bought anything from Aurora. More than happy so far, especially how quiet it is for a shredder. It makes my old Fellows one seen like a dinosaur. It is very quiet and it has so far handled the tasks without any drag on the unit and I did give it a run through. I shred things weekly so it should more than able to be up to the task. It is smaller than my old one and that is fine. What makes it better is the small wheels that are included to roll it around if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Works Mostly as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: For something that doesn't cost a lot of money it works quite well. You have to be sure to feed paper into the cutter the way it tells you to in the directions. If it's askew, it binds up. It does not intake the amount of paper that it says it does. We found that no more than five (5) sheets or less worked the best. It does cut up credit cards very well. Holds a good amount of debris. We have not run it so that it stops by itself. We leave it "on" so it's ready to use after we pick up our mail.
customer_reviews.author: Seekay

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: The old one I had from Amazon had a drawer that held the shredded paper. This one does not. You have to take the top off the bottom to dump the bottom. This means you should not only turn it off, but also pull the plug. I think this a safety hazard. It's OK for me but if I had a couple of kids running around, I'd send it back. The company warns about this, but i don't think it's enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: Effective; met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have tested it out over two days now: shreds paper quickly, and also knocks out credit cards in a snap. (The metaphor of shredding credit cards is inspiring.) Although it states "six-sheet," I prefer to limit it to two or three. Why wear it out? To remove the top, place the shredder in "jam remover" mode. Obviously leave it "off" so kids don't mess with it, or better yet, leave it unplugged, away from them. Please be careful with the blades-- it's like having a lawn mower in your office. This was not exactly a cheap price, but you get what you pay for in life. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is quiet as advertised. It also has a smaller footprint than our previous shredder. I've only had it for a short while so I cannot address its longevity but it appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: JNMNR

customer_reviews.title: Love this shredder!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent quite some time looking for a micro-cut shredder for my new home, with all those mails and stuff. This is a decent one with a pullout drawer, the noise is ok, not so loud. I feed it a few paper a time and it has been working quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Feng Feng

customer_reviews.title: a good home shredder
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is suprisingly quiet and handles multiple pages at a time. I did purchase some shredder oil and use it as directed. The only complaint is that I like to have a small trash bag in the bin so that it is easier to keep my area clean, but because I have a bag in it, the 'Full' light comes on more frequently and I have to push down the shredded contents to keep shredding. Not an issue but I wish it held a bag better. I would buy it again and am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: The shredder that can
customer_reviews.text: I laughed when two items I was rating for a paper shredder was sheerness and thickness. Whatever, it’s a bit heavy, but the features are great. Super quite and easy to empty. Would have like to have auto reverse, but I guess thats the next price up. Only complaint is it shreds very slowly and the control switch seems a little low budget. It’s not firm and seems like it could break with some force. Still, does the job. I like it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a long time for a replacement for my 9-year-old Fellows Shredder. Most either don't have the features I wanted or too expensive. I needed one that does Micro-Cut, shreds Credit Cards, and CD. This one ticked all the boxes. The bucket just pulls out for easy emptying, and isn't too big. It's quiet too. Only slight ding is that it's slow. Not a big deal for me since I don't shred a ton of stuff, but if you are buying it for office work it might be a hassle. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This Thing is So Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Compared to previous shredders. Looking underneath you can see a few rows of nasty-looking blades that look as if they will certainly live up to its description. The top is heavy and quite substantial giving you the feeling it is heavy duty and will handle what you throw at it. I tried it out on a few sheets and it did the job and it was so quiet in doing it. It really looks as though it is going to provide good service for a few years. Best shredder I've had so far.
customer_reviews.author: David Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Create your own free and recyclable shred bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shredder but wondered about how to not make a mess with the shreds. Here is a simple solution that has worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I had the shredder for a few months and only use it 2 times. First time perfect, second time some issues, today can't get it to shred. I didn't over load it with 24 sheets of paper at a time, not even 7 sheets. I didn't use any CDs yet, and it won't shred one sheet. Ism not happy with this product. I needed the shredder for home, privacy, and business. Very disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little shredder!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shredder. I have too much fun watching it shred confidential documents into tiny little pieces. The micro shredding is very secure. My only complaint is that the mode switch is not smooth and does not lock into position easily. As long as you are cognizant that the shredder is on when you need it to be on and off all other times, it will be an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joules

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I got this shredder a few weeks ago because I've been going through my files and disposing of some ancient paperwork. I've had a couple of marathon sorting-and-shredding sessions that have lasted multiple hours, and this thing has taken it like a champ. High capacity, good motor strength, no jams, no overheating, secure crosscut pattern, easy to empty. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: X. R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Effective and so quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I just got my Aurora 14 sheet micro shredder today and I’m already very pleased with it. Easy to set up and use. First thing I noticed was how quiet it shreds. And it shreds to tiny little confetti size pieces, security level P4 I believe. Top of machine is easy to pop off if you ever need to get at the blades for operator maintenance. Wish I gotten this earlier to replace my aging Staples shredder which was SOOOOO loud. High recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Panda

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: The good: quiet, reliable operation. Number of sheets shredded at one time is great - about 15 Needs improvement: the shred basket is incredibly small! Has to be emptied way too often - and creates a dust mess on inside of basket, on all associated parts. Am trying out a trash liner to see if that improves the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca101

customer_reviews.title: Rock Paper Scissors
customer_reviews.text: The way this shredder scissors paper rocks. Works as described. I usually shred mail in envelope with no issues. Feel better I went with the smaller cuts, which I think slows speed but this is plenty fast for my occasional mail shredding and home office needs. The extra security of the smaller cuts puts my mind at ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kennemusprime

customer_reviews.title: Best Shredder Ever
customer_reviews.text: Love my purchase so quiet, long lasting and easy slide out large basket for convenience and less time spent empting. Excellent product with quick delivery can handle the more pages, credit cards saving less time wasted standing bent over at the shredder. Wheels make it nice to bring next to your chair and desk for more ergonomic friendly task Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Okay purchase this now. So much quieter than our old shredder(at least 10yrs0ld). I kept thinking the old shredder would die and I would eventually get a new one, bought this and passed the old one to a friend. Live the crosscut, better privacy and I don’t have to empty as often. I don’t push the page limit, nor do I stop and count each sheet, just want them shredded
customer_reviews.author: Keith H

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good performance for micro shredder
customer_reviews.text: Had for about a month or so, works like a champ!! Can handle 8 or so papers at a time with no problem. I like the reverse feature. I think it maxes out at 5min before stopping for overheat protection but I normally get what I need done in 3 minutes or so, so no problem. Great machine, glad I purchased
customer_reviews.author: CleanGuy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Reasonably quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Just received and have not used extensively. Can’t speak to longevity. 14-sheet capacity is overstated. It will do 14 sheets but it’s working very hard. Handles ~8 sheets without a blip. Reasonably quiet. Bin will hold about 75 sheets (a guess). Bin not too difficult to empty. Can’t comment on durability. On/off switch feels like it may be an issue long-term. I would recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is quiet, handles as many as 8 pages at a time, cross cuts into tiny bits, including credit cards, and has a window in the basket so you can see when it needs to be emptied. The lift off head, although ergonomic, is a bit heavy and cumbersome, but not enough to detract from a 5-star rating at least from me. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Bettinger

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder, only one small complaint.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this shredder! Just got it today and shredded 3 13 gallon trash bags, intermittently over 3 hours, never overheated. Only gripe, like others is that it indicates that the bin is full when it isn't. You have to move the shreds to the back of the bin manually or tilt the whole unit back and gently shake it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ready, Set, Shred"
customer_reviews.text: Love this shredder. I bought this shredder after using Aurora during my 22 years of military service and knowing the name as a name that produce reliable products. It runs cooler that other names out there. "Shoot Straight" ~Pops~
customer_reviews.author: William F. Webb

customer_reviews.title: No worries for identity theft
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best shredder I have ever purchased. Love the small pieces documents are shredded into. Very quiet and handles 4-5 sheets nicely. I haven’t tried more sheets due to I don’t want to ruin this fantastic machine. Definitely would recommend others purchasing this make and model.
customer_reviews.author: Tdog2

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shredder
customer_reviews.text: I love this shredder. It is much faster and quieter than any I’ve used before. Hold the paper in front of it and it just seems to suck it in. With the smallest cut I’ve ever seen. Like I said I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: pjvandiver

customer_reviews.title: Performs As Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this Aurora shredder's performance for my home office. It is quiet, handles multiple sheets effortlessly, and shreds everything to micro-bits! It's a good value for the price and the compact size is a plus also.
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Frog

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, good continuous shredding
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and effortlessly shreds 6 sheets at a time. The bin full indicator comes on only when half full, which requires one to open the bin to level out the shredded paper. Will not work properly with a small trash bag placed into bin.
customer_reviews.author: RPC

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: My older shredder is a bit more robust but the auto on- auto -off feature stopped working. I use my new shredder for paperwork only and it's very quiet and does a fine job of shredding. The older one gets to shred the cds, credit cards etc. So far, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Snow Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use/personal information protection!
customer_reviews.text: This product works quite wonderfully. The thing I like most about it is that it shreds your files to such very small pieces. There's no way for someone to put the paperwork you shred back together unless they're in a forensic department and have several months to a year. Perfect for information protection. The only thing I think could be slightly better is if it was able to handle a few more sheets of paper at a time. I would definitely recommend this item and have already.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Kendall

customer_reviews.title: very quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: Runs quietly and shreds paper efficiently into tine pieces. I'm happy that it also accepts credit cards and discs. The bin rolls out and in smoothly. I empty the bin onto a tall kitchen trash bag.
customer_reviews.author: Padre Stash

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: It works without any issues but don't think it will take as much paper at a time as noted. I do 2 sheets it is fine, 3 starts to make the motor work and 4 sheets it gets loud and slows down.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: great for shredding mail
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of replacing the cheap little shredders I kept buying. I got this one so I could come in from getting the mail and just shred the junk mail in one swoop. It handles them envelope and all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Burton

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Sits well on top of a short cabinet. Cuts "micro-cut", good for shredding sensitive documents. Didn't want to spend the money for a "commercial" shredder, so this was a good purchase for the budget. Have used now for a couple weeks, and very happy with it's operation
customer_reviews.author: trucktricks

customer_reviews.title: amazing what this thing will shew trough
customer_reviews.text: very impressed with how well this shredder works chews through things like nothing and if you do happen to over feed it, it does not jam but merely reverses itself to clear anything before returning to eating paper like it should. Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: vince vavrosky

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Confetti Machine For Security
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do...it shreds stuff into confetti size bits. It is quiet, more than the one it replaced. If it lasts as long as the one it replaced I will be very happy. So far it does it's job and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: Macabee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cross cut ad unload. Also rolls easy.
customer_reviews.text: For home and small to medium size offices it’s a great machine. It’s a work horse for shredding 50 to 60 sheets spread through out the day for us. I wouldn’t be afraid to double that easily through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, Powerful piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: While we have not had this product for a long time, it came well packaged and un-damaged. It appears to be a well built piece of equipment. It is very quiet, and seems to be pretty powerful. I shred the whole envelope of “junk” mail, no problem. We like the cross cut shredding, small pieces. I will try to write another review as we use this product more, but at this moment I work definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one is next.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up not needing it, because the inferior shredder I have has a malfunctioning overheat light. But if I do kill my current shredder, I’ll get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Zabsolvo

customer_reviews.title: Affordable High Throughput Shredder
customer_reviews.text: I have had an Aurora brand desktop shredder for years. It has always been reliable. Thus, I bought a new higher powered cross cut version from Aurora. I'm quite happy with the purchase. The machine works well. It's fast and reliable. I've not experienced any issues. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a Beast!  A quiet Beast.
customer_reviews.text: More than met my expectations. Quiet as a mouse, but chomps up Big mouthfuls! I definitely recommend this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer in FL.

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and very effective
customer_reviews.text: This is the shreader that you want for secure disposal of sensitive materials. Small pieces. Size that stifles attempts to reconstruct. Very good shreader.
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet!  Cuts paper up into tiny pieces
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through several shredders and this is the best one yet. It is amazingly quiet!! Cuts paper into tiny pieces. Very pleased! Hope it lasts a long time...
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Good shredder
customer_reviews.text: I priced out shredders before I bought this and this is a good value for what you are getting. It works great and does not take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: HECTOR PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job of shredding my documents and cards. It is just a tad top heavy, but no complaints. Considering what it does for the price, it’s a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: “COWABUNGA!!!!!”
customer_reviews.text: Super Shredder That Didn’t Break The Bank! I recommend it Highly if you use a Shredder As much as We Do!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shredder
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and will shred 10+ pages at a time. Staples are no problem either. Easy to empty without making a mess too!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a very high end shredder. This shredder does not over heat nearly as quickly (90 minutes versus 20 minutes of continuous shredding). The cool-down does take a little longer. This shredder is at least only half as loud as the previous high end and does the same job. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Mandell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great shredder. I had several years of files to shred and I never had it overheat Decent size basket but it is a little awkward to empty into trash bags as it has a lip on one side. I’ve killed 2 previous shredders over the years so we’ll see how long this one lasts but so far it’s been great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke with one credit card.
customer_reviews.text: I used it a lot and was pleased with it, until I put a single credit card through it. The mechanism jammed and when I tried to reverse it it made a lot of noise. After clearing the jammed plastic, it makes loud noises and will no longer work. Can not function forward or reverse.
customer_reviews.author: KRI

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast!
customer_reviews.text: Best shredder I have ever used at any price. It is very quiet, strong, and well built.
customer_reviews.author: David Moore

customer_reviews.title: Quiet. Good Quality. Great upgrade from regular cross cut shredder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent upgrade when compared to my older 12page cross cut Royal shredder. Much quieter too. No problems shredding tens of junk email envelopes into satisfying micro pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D. Lepczak

customer_reviews.title: It shreds like confetti.
customer_reviews.text: Just purchase this shredded less than a month ago. I love that it is quiet and it shreds so small there is no way to put the document back together.
customer_reviews.author: Kay1

customer_reviews.title: Great Shredder
customer_reviews.text: This Shredder is amazing for the price, much better than our last Shredder.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: best shredder for the money
customer_reviews.text: this is the best shredder for the cost we have ever had. Only had it a few months so can't comment on longevity yet but it is well made so hping for the best
customer_reviews.author: Steven B Garner

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHREDDER !!!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this shredder!! Its quiet and I love the large basket. BEST shredder I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Vettecor

customer_reviews.title: worked well, for 1 year
customer_reviews.text: the good part is this shredder worked well for exactly 1 year; the bad part is then the blades seem to get distorted with 1 side becoming loose. And the loose side can only produce stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Shaowu Bao

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts - NO customer service
customer_reviews.text: The shredder itself works great. I was missing parts, and have contacted customer service 3 times to no avail. If customer service would like to respond, I’ll be happy to give a much higher review.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moore

customer_reviews.title: powerful, quiet
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job well, much better than my previous shredder.
customer_reviews.author: landlord

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: The paper slot is a little small but so far been a good machine
customer_reviews.author: Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect micro shredder!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it yesterday and shredded a bunch of envelopes with letters. Works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for my personal office it it 👍
customer_reviews.text: no complaints, very happy with performance. I do not shred a lot so I must admit that I have not put it through any though demands. So I can only confirm that it does great for small personal office.
customer_reviews.author: Ric O

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package and found that not only was the top part of the shredder split into two separate parts with the inner parts spilling out, but that the paper bin itself was also cracked and torn. Save your money and find another product.
customer_reviews.author: Annoyed

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shredder for home use. It replaced a 10 year old model that was very noisy and only shredded one sheet at a time without jamming. No complaints so far, and the smaller cuts are good.
customer_reviews.author: Mark - Brooksville, Fl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Good bang for the buck. Very well-built. No complaints. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Durable, easy to put together, and a nice sight glass to see how full it is.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Shredded
customer_reviews.text: Good machine handles all my needs, works very good, easy dump holds nice amount.
customer_reviews.author: Don Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Compact convenient tool of the home office.
customer_reviews.text: It's small enough to be out of the way and unobtrusive in the office, making it within easy reach. The small pieces cut makes it convenient not having to empty it as aften.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Good shredder
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a lower price cross cut shredder and came across this micro cut shredder. Works great and price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Dairydennis

customer_reviews.title: Best shredder I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: It’s great and it’s fairly quiet, compared to my old one works great and takes more sheets at a time
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shredder for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Shredder for the Price. Amazing quiet. Shreds as advertized.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: shedder
customer_reviews.text: Works well very quiet rolls with no effert and does a great job
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA

customer_reviews.title: This is the shredder you want!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Love that the basket just pulls out. Very quiet. Have shredded two boxes full of bills etc. and everything worked very well. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: imark24

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s not too loud and does not over heat after 1000 pages of shredding continuously
customer_reviews.author: Mhonica

customer_reviews.title: Nice shredder
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for home use; quiet, easy to use. only thing I don't like is the basket is too small and has to be emptied often.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: It’s everything it said it was
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet operation. Have not had any problems in 4-5 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Caveny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home office.
customer_reviews.text: Great shredder! Quieter and quicker than expected. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: michaela biray

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, good size. Micro cuts credit cards and paper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is perfect for a home office. It will shred 12+ sheets of paper at one time. Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and powerful, this unit has a large, easy to empty receptacle and shreds paper into tiny bits. Three times the cost of our old one, but 10 times the value.
customer_reviews.author: Biggreydog

product_meta.title: Aurora AU1410MA Professional Grade High Security 14-Sheet Micro-Cut Paper/CD and Credit Card/ 30 Minutes Continuous Run Time Shredder
product_meta.description: Size:AU1410MA 14-Sheet Microcut/CD/30 minThe Aurora AU1410MA 14-Sheet micro-cut paper/ CD/ credit card shredder with 5.0-Gallon PULLOUT basket is the perfect business and home office device to keep you safe from identity theft. The AU1410MA accepts up to 14 sheets of paper at a time and shreds them into small pieces (5/32 by 15/32 inches), security level P-4. In addition to paper, the AU1410MA shreds CDs/DVDs/credit cards, keeping vital information from falling into the wrong hands. The throat of the shredder is 8.7 inches wide and has the casters for easy mobility. Product Dimensions: 14.41" W x 11.02" L x 19.33" H Item weight: 22.42 pounds shipping weight: 25.9 pounds Item AU1410MA number: AU1410MA
feature_bullets: High security micro-cut with 14 sheet capacities; destroys CDs, DVDs, credit cards and small paper clips
Shreds paper, CDs, DVDs, credit cards into small pieces (5/32 by 15/32 inches), security level P-4
Anti-jam auto-reverse to clear paper jams; ultra-quiet operation
5.0-Gallon pullout bin with LED indicator lights standby/ overheat/ bin-full/ overload/ door open status.Basket Capacity:300 sheets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars230 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
